Headline: #157 Streeterville/Taylor, #18 16th-18th Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Ogden/Rockwell
ShortDescription: Eastbound 157 Streeterville/Taylor, 18 16th-18th buses are temporarily rerouted due to street blockage near Ogden/Rockwell.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound 157 Streeterville/Taylor, 18 16th-18th buses are temporarily rerouted due to street blockage near Ogden/Rockwell.

Eastbound buses are temporarily rerouted via Ogden, California, Roosevelt and Western including the normal route streets, due to street blockage near Ogden/Rockwell.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Southbound #8A South Halsted Temporary Reroute near Halsted/88th
ShortDescription: Southbound 8A South Halsted buses are temporarily rerouted near Halsted/88th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #8A South Halsted buses are temporarily rerouted via Halsted, 88th, Vincennes, 95th, Halsted, and resume normal route, due to, street blockage near Halsted/88th.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
